devdoc.author: The Sandbox
devdoc.details: Implements a fake ERC721 interface and acts as an intermediary for NFT purchases

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

approve(address,uint256).details: Required for interface compatibility, but no actual functionality

params.amount: The amount of tokens approved for the purchase
params.nftCollection: Address of the NFT Collection contract
params.sender: The original sender of the approveAndCall transaction
params.tokenAmount: The number of tokens to mint
params.wallet: The wallet to receive the NFT

returns._0: The result of the NFT minting operation

params._sandToken: Address of the Sand token contract

onERC721Received(address,address,uint256.details: Forwards the received token to the intended recipient

params.data: Additional data with no specified format
params.from: The address which previously owned the token
params.operator: The address which called the `safeTransferFrom` function
params.tokenId: The ID of the token being transferred

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256.details: Required for interface compatibility, but no actual functionality
Required for interface compatibility, but no actual functionality

setApprovalForAll(address,bool).details: Required for interface compatibility, but no actual functionality

params._sandToken: Address of the new Sand token contract

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Required for interface compatibility, but no actual functionality

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: PurchaseWrapper

approve(address,uint256).notice: Fake ERC721 approval implementation that does nothing

confirmPurchase(address,address,uint256,.notice: Handles the purchase confirmation and initiates the NFT minting

onERC721Received(address,address,uint256.notice: Handles the receipt of an ERC721 token

resetMintState().notice: Emergency function to reset mint state if stuck

safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256.notice: Fake ERC721 safe transfer implementation that does nothing
Fake ERC721 safe transfer with data implementation that does nothing

setApprovalForAll(address,bool).notice: Fake ERC721 setApprovalForAll implementation that does nothing

setSandToken(address).notice: Updates the Sand token contract address

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: Fake ERC721 transfer implementation that does nothing

userdoc.notice: Contract that facilitates NFT purchases through ERC20 tokens
